timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-08-26T17:39:56", "sender_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "recipient_email": "cutnurulhafifah@gmail.com", "subject": "Action Required: Review & Sign Your UCL Accommodation Offer \u2013 Rathbone Place, London", "message": "Hi Cut,\\n\\nI hope you're doing well!\\n\\nI'm Rishabh, your Booking Manager at Amber. Thank you for choosing Amber for your student accommodation in London \u2014 we\u2019re excited to assist you as the official accommodation partner for University College London (UCL).\\n\\nYour booking at Rathbone Place, London (Half Twin Bedroom) is now progressing, and the offer will be sent to your email shortly.\\n---------------------------------------------------------------\\n\\n\u2705 Next Steps to Secure Your Booking:\\n\\n-\\nReview & Sign the Offer:\\nOnce the offer email arrives, kindly review the details and sign the agreement to confirm your room.\\n\\n-\\nGuarantor (if applicable):\\nIf a guarantor is required, they will receive a separate email. Please ask them to upload their documents and sign promptly.\\n\\n-\\nPayment:\\nAfter signing, please share the initial payment receipt with us so we can confirm everything with the property.\\n\\n---------------------------------------------------------------\\n\\nIf you have any questions or need help at any stage, feel free to reply to this email or message me on WhatsApp. I\u2019m here to make this process smooth and stress-free for you!\\n\\nLooking forward to getting your booking secured soon.\\n\\nWarm regards,\\nRishabh\\nBooking Manager \u2013 Amber\\n\\n--\\n\\n[amberstudent.com]\\n\\nRishabh M\\n\\nSenior Operation Associate\\n\\nPhone: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nWhatsapp: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nEmail: [rishabh.m@amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nWebsite: [amberstudent.com]()", "snippet": "Hi Cut, I hope you're doing well! I'm Rishabh, your Booking Manager at Amber. Thank you for choosing Amber for your student accommodation in London \u2014 we're excited to assist you as the", "direction": "outbound", "sender_type": "agent", "agent_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "student_email": "cutnurulhafifah@gmail.com"}
